login.title: HOME
login.visapText: Visual Representation is an Effective media of communicating information to an end user and if used creatively, can become a powerful expressive tool. In this Product,Clients can upload and edit static,youtube,direct URL Videos by adding Annotations,Sketches, Questions,Hot spot, Whiteboard,Tags and Links which will provide additional information about the content in different forms.Product Provides the option for the user to have his own store where he can have his Videos.
